parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

**

Valid values: 10, 20, 50, and 100.**** Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description:
The role that is assigned to the user. Valid values:

*   **USER**: a regular user.
*   **DBA** : a database administrator (DBA).
*   **ADMIN**: a Data Management (DMS) administrator.
*   **SECURITY_ADMIN**: a security administrator.
*   **STRUCT_READ_ONLY**: a schema read-only user.

>  To check your role, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the DMS console.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The search keyword. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.

parameters.name: UserState
parameters.description:
The status of the user. Valid values:

*   **NORMAL**: The user is normal.
*   **DISABLE**: The user is disabled.
*   **DELETE**: The user is deleted.
